name: Diluc
desc: The tycoon of a winery empire in Mondstadt, unmatched in every possible way.

elemSkill.name: Searing Onslaught
elemSkill.desc: Performs a forward slash that deals Pyro DMG. This skill can be used 3 times consecutively. Enters CD if not cast again within a short period. The slashes represent the values that Diluc holds dear: one for justice, one for courage, and one for duty.

elemBurst.name: Dawn
elemBurst.desc: Releases intense flames to knock nearby opponents back, dealing Pyro DMG. The flames then converge into the weapon, summoning a Phoenix that flies forward and deals massive Pyro DMG to all opponents in its path. The Phoenix explodes upon reaching its destination, causing a large amount of AoE Pyro DMG. The searing flames that run down his blade cause it to be infused with Pyro. The only reason to walk in the darkness is to light it up. Behold, that fleeing light in the dead of night is the herald of the coming dawn.

attackSkill.name: Normal Attack: Tempered Sword
attackSkill.desc:
<color=#FFD780FF>Normal Attack</color>
Perform up to 4 consecutive strikes.

<color=#FFD780FF>Charged Attack</color>
Drains Stamina over time to perform continuous slashes.
At end of the sequence, perform a more powerful slash.

<color=#FFD780FF>Plunging Attack</color>
Plunges from mid-air to strike the ground, damaging opponents along the path and dealing AoE DMG upon impact.

c13ns.name: Conviction
c13ns.desc: Diluc deals 15% more DMG to opponents whose HP is above 50%.

c13ns.name: Searing Ember
c13ns.desc: When Diluc takes DMG, his ATK increases by 10% and his ATK SPD increases by 5%. Lasts for 10s.\nThis effect can stack up to 3 times and can only occur once every 1.5s.

c13ns.name: Fire and Steel
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Flowing Flame
c13ns.desc: Casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color> in sequence greatly increases damage dealt.\nWithin 2s of using <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color>, casting the next Searing Onslaught in the combo deals 40% additional DMG. This effect lasts for the next 2s.

c13ns.name: Phoenix, Harbinger of Dawn
c13ns.desc: Increases the Level of <color=#FFD780FF>Dawn</color> by 3.\nMaximum upgrade level is 15.

c13ns.name: Flaming Sword, Nemesis of the Dark
c13ns.desc: After casting <color=#FFD780FF>Searing Onslaught</color>, the next 2 Normal Attacks within the next 6s will have their DMG and ATK SPD increased by 30%.\nAdditionally, Searing Onslaught will not interrupt the Normal Attack combo.
